txt: If you have a question or anything else, feel free to contact me.
name: Your name
placeholdermess: Hello, I'd like to talk about...
skill: Discover a selection of my projects in system administration, networking, and cybersecurity. These works demonstrate my technical skills and ability to design secure solutions.

1.title: System Administration - DNS & DHCP
1.description: Setup of a DHCP server with dynamic DNS under VMware using bind9 for a secure and reliable network infrastructure.

2.title: Vehicle Rental System
2.description: Design and implementation of a SQL database for a rental company managing 50 vehicles and 100 clients with a management interface.

3.title: Multi-Site Network Architecture
3.description: Design of a corporate network spread over 4 countries with 1000 PCs and inter-VLAN communication, implemented via Cisco Packet Tracer.

4.title: Secure Virtualization Environment
4.description: Deployment of a virtual infrastructure with Proxmox including Zabbix for monitoring, NextCloud for storage, and MySQL for data management.

about1: I am Simon Boisneault, a second-year Bachelor student in Engineering and Cybersecurity at EFREI Paris. Passionate about vulnerability analysis and system administration, I am constantly seeking new opportunities to deepen my knowledge in cybersecurity. My academic background, complemented by diverse professional experiences, has provided me with a strong understanding of modern cybersecurity challenges.
about2: My technical skills include proficiency in languages such as Python and C, web development, and management of Linux and Windows Server systems. I also have hands-on experience in securing networks, data protection, and virtualization using VMware. My recent internship at TVHconsulting allowed me to work on real-world projects such as network mapping, configuring security solutions, and migrating to Intune, further strengthening my operational cybersecurity expertise.
cyber2: Vulnerability analysis, network security, data protection, and setting up intrusion detection systems with tools like Sophos and Cyberwatch.
dev2: Skills in programming with Python, C, HTML/CSS, React JS and JavaScript. Creating automation scripts and developing solutions to enhance system security.
admin2: Managing virtual machines (Debian, pfsense, Kali, Windows Server), configuring DNS and DHCP servers, and administering complex networks.
